title: How to Name a Model Horse

steps.headline: Consider its color.
steps.description: For example, if you have an appaloosa, why not call it something like Penny or Cinnamon?

steps.headline: Try out naming it after other people.
steps.description: Does it look like a famous horse? Why not name it after them? If you love a celebrity, you could name it after him or her.

steps.headline: Think of a personality!
steps.description: Can it jump really high? Call it High Flyer! If it’s lovable, call it Snuggles. Try not to think of names too cheesy.

steps.headline: Think about its markings.
steps.description: For example, Socks, Blaze, or Snip. These markings can make naming the horse much easier.

steps.headline: 'Soft' Names.
steps.description: If you want your horse's name to be a gentle set name, if it is a mare, consider calling her Bella. If it is a stallion or a gelding, call it Abe, Doc, or Bailey.

steps.headline: Imagination.
steps.description: If you want to name your toy horse, or a real one, try to dig into your imagination. Think of something the horse could have been, or if it has powers or magic. Normally these thoughts make the horse's name magical and fun.

text: Consider its color. For example, if you have an appaloosa, why not call it something like Penny or Cinnamon? Try out naming it after other people. Does it look like a famous horse? Why not name it after them? If you love a celebrity, you could name it after him or her. Think of a personality! Can it jump really high? Call it High Flyer! If it’s lovable, call it Snuggles. Try not to think of names too cheesy. Think about its markings. For example, Socks, Blaze, or Snip. These markings can make naming the horse much easier. 'Soft' Names. If you want your horse's name to be a gentle set name, if it is a mare, consider calling her Bella. If it is a stallion or a gelding, call it Abe, Doc, or Bailey. Imagination. If you want to name your toy horse, or a real one, try to dig into your imagination. Think of something the horse could have been, or if it has powers or magic. Normally these thoughts make the horse's name magical and fun.
